Analyte(s): IgG antibodies to Cyclic Citrullinated Peptides (CCP)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Euro-Diagnostica CCPoint visually read lateral flow test to detect IgG anti-CCP antibodies in human serum or plasma for rheumatoid arthritis diagnosis
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative rapid lateral flow test for detection of IgG antibodies to CCP in human plasma or serum, aiding the diagnosis of rheumatoid arthritis in conjunction with other clinical findings and laboratory results, for trained laboratory professionals, for in vitro diagnostic use
